title: Sasada Wa Okane De Oshi Wo Daku
alternative_title: Sasada Embraces Her Oshi with the Power of Money ; ササダはオカネで推しを抱く
status: Sasada Embraces Her Oshi with the Power of Money ; ササダはオカネで推しを抱く
description:
Description :
        *"Come on...! You want this, don't you? Here comes the donation!" *Sasada Natsuko — an otaku living the hopeless existence of a wage slave for an abusive company.What saved her was a streamer with an animated avatar — a VTuber — called Amano Amao. Knowing Amao's propensity to be turned on by money, Sasada shows her love in the form of AkaSupas (pricey donations) night after night!But Amao's past life (real life person) is actually hiding a secret...?A woman who works for the sake of the oshi who saved her, and a man who isn't making progress despite being her oshi.The *virtual* and the *real* — does this love have any hope for crossplay!?
